item.title: Jupiter (Awaiting Return)
item.description: https://youtu.be/ndt_UpllxJQ If Feljin or Ryu were to play the piano, what would they play, and what story would they tell? That was my thought process going into this project. This piece is inspired by Awaiting Return by Kevin MacLeod, the background music our DM used at one point for the “BRB” screen (for IRL short rests) in the Phandelver campaign. That piece itself is a derivative of the middle section of Jupiter, one of the movements from “The Planets” orchestral suite by Gustav Holst.

item.title: Eonian
item.description: https://youtu.be/zApesb8vqdk Based on the Animenz arrangement: Video, Sheets. I remember the first time I heard Animenz’s cover of this in 2015, the second chorus (~2:48) gave me goosebumps! It had been on my mind ever since to learn to play this someday. The movie itself is pretty good IMO. It got a bit of attention back when it came out for using 3DCG, and also because it was screen-written by the one and only Urobucher.

item.title: Champion Cynthia
item.description: https://youtu.be/tFrHxj6Cipc I basically grew up on Pokemon games. And if there’s one thing I can tell you about the video game series, you will know when you’re about to against a formidable opponent. The music will let you know. Hailing from “the land of piano”, Champion Cynthia is no exception. Leading an arsenal of powerful Pokemon that the player likely haven’t encountered up to that point, she descends to her throne as the final opponent at the Sinnoh League, ready to crush the player’s dreams.

item.title: Êâì‰∏äËä±ÁÅ´ / Uchiage Hanabi
item.description: https://youtu.be/6YeJs7StCPM This was my second full arrangement cover! I haven’t turned it into sheets yet. Whether or not I end up doing that, piecing this together was a learning experience. Before I get to anything else - yes the video is SHAKY AF. It’s really too bad. Watch it on a small screen - it’s not as noticeable üòÇ Ever since I watched the original MV this song was on the bucket list.

item.title: Euterpe
item.description: https://youtu.be/aqBJfW4wmlg Based on the Animenz arrangement: Video, Sheets. Another piece from Animenz’s Guilty Crown suite of covers, also from his earlier days. It’s in the same starting key as Bios but at a slower pace, 3⁄4 signature, and a lot more room for expressiveness. The middle section is the most interesting to play, requiring fast right hand runs in the upper registers, mixed in with occasional slowdown/speedups as an artifact of “squeezing in” few more notes into the measure.

item.title: Ëôπ„ÅÆÂàóËªä / Niji no Ressha
item.description: https://youtu.be/qpgKnphVYQo Based on the Animenz arrangement: Video, Sheets. I love the lyrics of these 0048 songs! This one in particular is high energy and catchy, and I also kinda like its use of the “canon progression”. This is one of the more difficult Animenz pieces I’ve learned to date, and also one of the most fun to play! As usual, there is a story, and I’ve added a custom intro that marks a personal turning point, a new beginning, a departure… and then dove right in:

item.title: Hedgehog's Dilemma
item.description: https://youtu.be/Zco5ldaFyhA This cover is based on the scores by Cosmo Pianist. In general this was a good etude for dynamics and dissonant chords. I didn’t hold back when it came to expression - overlaying my emotions along with the somber world view that is ‘Neon Genesis Evangelion’. I tapped into some of the heavy scenes from the work for inspiration; think - drowning, choking. Yeah that’s pretty fucked up imagery to draw on, but he just wouldn’t shut the fuck up.

item.title: √üios (YT)
item.description: https://youtu.be/5il_kB_4L2s Based on the Animenz arrangement: Video, Sheets. Another shot at this song! This time with the new recording environment (and no pressure from live streaming üòÖ), and also with a new me having gone through some internal turmoil (see the rant posts before this lol). Post from previous attempt Outside of the recording quality, this take is arguably not so much better than my previous run, but there are several changes that I’d note as improvements.

item.title: On Emotional Connection, part 2
item.description: Continuing the ludicrous exploration which set off my previous post, I’d like to revisit the term attached. The definition is reproduced below: attached | 2 : emotionally connected : having strong feelings of affection or connection There’s an implication of a connection with emotion as the basis. What exactly does this mean? Maybe different things depending on the context and the individuals involved? Before moving forwards, I’ll also reproduce below a previous snippet of my take on emotion and it’s relation to attraction:

item.title: On Emotional Connection, part 1
item.description: I’m not quite sure where to start for what I said in the previous post, but I figure I at the end of the day I want to understand what love is, so why not use the MW definitons of love as an entry point? Not like I’m going to understand in one day, but a north star would be helpful because I’m sure I’ll get lost along the way.

item.title: Prelude
item.description:
If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them. – Henry David Thoreau, Walden
In hindsight, I’ve been throwing out words like “romantic love” and “emotional connection” without a clear understanding of them. As in, I currently don’t have the ability to clearly and concisely explain to someone what those words mean to me.

item.title: A New Leaf
item.description: Being polite is good, but being active is as important. If you don’t say anything, the things you want won’t appear right before you. – a wise friend Those were the words of my wise friend, who wrote to me years ago. You may remember that I shared them with you too. To this day, I still find myself scared to embrace those words. But there are also times when painfully I realize what he meant.

item.title: Read the Air
item.description: If my message didn’t make sense - that was my nice way of saying, “fuck off because you’re not helping me right now.” I let the first one go but the second just felt disrespectful. Maybe you are not so great at Á©∫Ê∞ó„ÇíË™≠„ÇÄ„Åì„Å®, as you hinted at before. And as good as it sounds, I don’t think “treat others the way you want to be treated” needs to apply to every situation.

item.title: Strange
item.description:
I thought you understood, so I was a bit surprised to see you break the silence. That’s cheating.
I see your perspective though. Thoughts have an expiration date. (And feelings have expirations too apparently… as I learned the hard way. fml.)
Thanks for sharing. My initial response was - wtf why are you doing this to me? Stop making me even more sad, lmao. I do like the chords and the voice.

item.title: Your Name
item.description:
As usual, the first thing that crosses my mind when I wake up is your name. Is that disgusting? What’s unusual is that I’ve been waking up way before the time I set on my alarm clock. What’s unusual is that I just lay there for hours, trying to convince myself, you don’t really care about me. Isn’t that disgusting?
As of this point, I still find the need to do this until I can get up again.

item.title: I Need to Know
item.description:
Today I re-listened to the Radwimps song from Weathering with You. The lyrics hurt more than ever.
This is the courage that you gave me So I want to use it for you This is the love that you helped me grow So it won’t mean anything if it’s not with you Is there anything that love can still do? Is there anything that I can still do?

item.title: Partner
item.description: I can see where you are coming from. But there are some things I fail to understand completely. If I had a partner, I’d want them to fulfill as much of my wants as possible. I feel like I’d do anything I can (within reason I guess) to help fulfill my partner’s wants? Like even if you know you can’t do so immediately, wouldn’t you still want to and eventually try to reach a level that you can?

item.title: Broke
item.description:
Every time I reread your words, I increasingly realize that you’re on a different, much higher stratum than the one I am on. They say you can’t buy love, but I’m beginning to think that maybe love is a bit like money? You won’t spend it on others if you don’t have enough yourself, right?
I guess what I’m trying to say is that I’m broke as fuck.

item.title: Meaning
item.description:
Did my life lose all meaning? Everything hurts.
Did life even have meaning before this? Was I just trying to put meaning into it? Is that wrong?

item.title: Â§â„Çè„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ
item.description: Notes Video: https://youtu.be/_xTmQi57xmk Sheets: https://gakufu.poly2d.xyz/kawaranaimono.pdf Writing this retroactively. The cover was posted on Mar 13. Sheets were completed in May afterwards. My first piano arrangement, and a special song for a special occasion. This initial intent was to present sheets to accompany the video in March. But I ended up abandoning it - the more I tried to work on it, the more I found the idea “limiting”.

item.title: „Åè„Å°„Å•„ÅëDiamond
item.description: Notes Based on the Animenz arrangement Video: https://youtu.be/P6C3szts5C4 Sheet: https://sheet.host/sheet/IGm7F5 This was a ‘high reach’ piece for me in terms of difficulty. But it’s a special song and a cover had to be done. The most difficult segments of the song are the chorus which feature fast left-hand jumps. Many retakes were done due to a lack of accuracy here. While less obvious, “first verse” at 0:39 (measures 25-32) was also quite challenging.

item.title: ÂçÉÊú¨Ê°ú (YT)
item.description: Notes First YouTube upload! The previous Periscopes were captured entirely on phone, but this was the first attempt at using an audio interface in search for better sound quality. I mixed in elements from a few inspirations. Flowering Night from the Touhou series was used at 1:34 (a nod to Niconico covers) and a variation based on Lindsey Stirling’s cover at 1:47. The “guitar riff” part of the song was skipped in favor of a more gentle bridge and reprise.

item.title: Twice 4th Anniv Medley (live)
item.description: üéπ Twice we FANCY YOU (medley) #Twice4thAnniversary #TWICEMakesMeFeelSpecial #Twice #piano #live https://t.co/EZKzmqV0gK — Ryu (@poly2d) October 20, 2019 Excerpts FANCY (~0:00) What is Love? (~2:00) Like OOH-AHH (~3:28) Dance the Night Away (~4:57) Heart Shaker - outro (~6:45) Notes I stuck to the A-side tracks for this medley. I just used the songs that came to my mind, but if I were to retroactively state a reason for each:

item.title: Bios - Guilty Crown (live)
item.description: üéπ Guilty Crown - Œ≤ios „ÇÆ„É´„ÉÜ„Ç£„ÇØ„É©„Ç¶„É≥ OST #Piano #Music https://t.co/mhtr6ELk5O — Ryu (@poly2d) October 14, 2019 Notes Based on the Animenz arrangement Video: https://youtu.be/DcjUOdeq6G8 Sheet: https://sheet.host/sheet/1uMLWW Original: https://youtu.be/UMCka_vXtL4 The soundtrack of the Guilty Crown series was what led me to find Animenz on youtube in early 2012. I found his cover of √üios. I had some lessons during my childhood, but by this time I had absolutely forgotten how to play piano.

item.title: ÂçÉÊú¨Ê°ú / Senbonzakura (live)
item.description: üéπ ÂçÉÊú¨Ê°ú / Senbonzakura live piano #ÂàùÈü≥„Éü„ÇØÁîüË™ïÁ•≠2019 #HatsuneMikuBirthday https://t.co/HNJVg866Mn — Ryu (@poly2d) September 1, 2019 Notes Original: https://youtu.be/P6C3szts5C4 This live of Senbonzakura was for a special occasion: 13th anniversary of Hatsune Miku! I have fond memories of this song because my roommates and I played it a lot in Taiko no Tatsujin. I borrowed some small nuances and snippets from two of my favorite covers of this song (listed below) - can you spot them?

item.title: NGE Medley (live)
item.description: This was the first piano post I shared on Twitter! The hype in this day and age was how Neon Genesis Evangelion was coming to Netflix (at least for a subset of the internet üôÇ). That led me to revisit some of the theme songs from the franchise. üéπ„Éç„Éà„Éï„É™„Å´„Ç®„É¥„Ç°Êù•„Åü„Çâ„Åó„ÅÑ„ÅÆ„ÅßOP„Å®„ÅãÂºæ„ÅÑ„Å¶„Åø„Çã/ Songs from the anime Neon Genesis Evangelion (live piano) #evangelion https://t.co/0D1wohnbiB — Ryu (@poly2d) June 22, 2019 Excerpts ÊÆãÈÖ∑„Å™Â§©‰Ωø„ÅÆ„ÉÜ„Éº„Çº / Cruel Angel‚Äôs Thesis (TV Series OP) (Transition) [SPOILER WARNING] Ep 19 ÂàùÂè∑Ê©ü„ÅåÊö¥Ëµ∞„Åô„ÇãÊôÇ„ÅÆBGM / Unit-1 goes berserk Fly me to the moon (TV Series ED) Beautiful world (Rebuild 1.
